root: ^Oh another one. Much younger though. Greetings. You may ask me some questions, so choose wisely.

questions: ^What can you tell me about the creature who inhabits the creak?

c-3: ^ Alright. Since you're so young, I'll give you a chance to make your way out.
^Here''s a minigame. Use the WS keys to move and avoid the obstacles coming your way, until the time is up. Good luck!

C1: ^So you do know about Huba Hub- I mean, the Great Huba.
C1_1: ^Huba likes to train their brain. They are out of games these days and are kinda getting on our nerves.
C1_2: ^It really depends on your definition of dangerous.
C2: ^Well there was this funny boy who came around some time ago. Albeit out of crippling fear, he was wise enough to leave rather quickly.
^That lying coward... Oly never met any of you?
C3: ^I happen to be a Salamander who speaks, genius.
